{"id":579937622,"lang":"cpp","time":"3Â weeks","timestamp":1635683819,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/579937622/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Integer to Roman","memory":"13 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string intToRoman(int num) {\n        map<int,string>m;\n        m.insert({1,\"I\"});\n          m.insert({4,\"IV\"});\n          m.insert({5,\"V\"});\n           m.insert({9,\"IX\"});        \n         m.insert({10,\"X\"});\n           m.insert({40,\"XL\"});\n         m.insert({50,\"L\"});\n          m.insert({90,\"XC\"});\n           m.insert({100,\"C\"});\n        m.insert({400,\"CD\"});\n         m.insert({500,\"D\"});\n         m.insert({900,\"CM\"});\n         m.insert({1000,\"M\"});\n        string ans=\"\";\n        \n        for(auto i=m.rbegin();i!=m.rend();i++)\n        {\n        while(num>=i->first)\n        {\n            num-=i->first;\n            ans+=i->second;\n            \n        }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"integer-to-roman"}
